name: CITIES SERVICE OIL COMPANY v. Frank P. QUIRK and Frank's Service Center, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Cities Service Oil Co. v. Quirk

judges: PACKEL, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
POMEROY, J., filed a concurring opinion in which NIX, J., joins.
NIX, J., joins in this opinion.
parties: CITIES SERVICE OIL COMPANY v. Frank P. QUIRK and Frank’s Service Center, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Orders of the Superior Court and court of common pleas vacated and proceedings remanded for consideration in light of Atlantic Richfield Co. v. Razumic, 480 Pa. 366, 390 A.2d 736 (1978).
PACKEL, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
POMEROY, J., filed a concurring opinion in which NIX, J., joins.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
POMEROY, Justice,
concurring.
For the reasons set forth in my opinion in Kowatch v. Atlantic Richfield Co., 480 Pa. 388, 390 A.2d 747 (1978) (concurring opinion of POMEROY, J.), I concur in the remand of the instant case for a determination of the legal issues therein presented.
NIX, J., joins in this opinion.
opinions.author: POMEROY, Justice,

attorneys: Zarwin, Baum, Arangio & Somerson, Norman P. Zarwin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Williams, Glantz & Schildt, Samuel Glantz, Levittown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
390 A.2d 749
CITIES SERVICE OIL COMPANY v. Frank P. QUIRK and Frank’s Service Center, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 10, 1978.
Zarwin, Baum, Arangio & Somerson, Norman P. Zarwin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Williams, Glantz & Schildt, Samuel Glantz, Levittown, for appellee.
